item.title: I Need Some Help With A Script Please
item.dc:creator: @nathan nathan
item.description:
@nathan wrote:

[code]public class GiantKillaz extends Script
{

public static String[] commands = {“GiantKillaz”}; // choose what command you want . Ive chosen PFish for power fish
/* Ive Globely Decalred Varibles here */
public static final int DOOR = 1804;
private static final Tile[] GIANTS = new Tile[] {
new Tile(3184,3439), new Tile(3183,3435), new Tile(3179,3432),
new Tile(3173,3431), new Tile(3167,3427), new Tile(3163,3424),
new Tile(3157,3424), new Tile(3153,3420), new Tile(3148,3426),
new Tile(3137,3429), new Tile(3131,3431), new Tile(3127,3434),
new Tile(3125,3439), new Tile(3124,3443), new Tile(3119,3448),
new Tile(3115,3449), new Tile(3115,3449), new Tile(3115,3449)
};

public boolean start(String cmd, String[] args)
{
walkPath(GIANTS);
return true; // later we will put in a check here to check if we have a fishing net and if we dont , dont fish
// if we do , fish

}

public long run(long lastExecuted)

return runGiant(); // excecute runFish Method

}// end of run command

// begining of Methods

// Start of runGiant method.
private long runGiant()
{
walkPath(GIANTS)
{
useObject(983,DOOR)
}
return random(1000,2000);
}

}// end of script[/code]

now where would i add the command to use the key on the door to get in

Read full topic
